Angulum concert tour 2024 Spring Secret Secret will start on the 1st.
This tour is for Rikako Sasaki's graduation tour.
We'll be performing in Kesennuma City.

I am Itsuki Nishimura, a first-year junior high school student from Kanagawa Prefecture. My favorite food is salmon and grilled salmon roe. I am looking forward to working with you.
I am Yume Soma, a first-year junior high school student from Saitama. My favorite food is hamburgers and sweets in general. I look forward to working with you.
I am Mano Ohtsubo, a sixth grader from Kanagawa Prefecture.
My favorite food is omu-rice, takoyaki and hitsu-mabushi. I look forward to working with you.
I am Hikari Yoshida, a 6th grader from Tokyo. My favorite food is yakiniku and salmon roe made by my mom. I look forward to working with you.
I am Meisa Sugihara, a 6th grader from Hyogo. My favorite food is all kinds of fruit, fruit candy, and udon noodles made by my mom. I am looking forward to working with you.
My name is Roha Hattori, a 5th grader from Aichi Prefecture. My favorite food is stewed hamburger steak made by my mom and pumpkin curry made by my dad. Please take care of me.
Yes, thank you all very much.

This is Haroste, featuring Ayumi Ishida of Morning Musume 24 and Wakana Matsumoto of Angelem.
We'd like to talk a little bit about each other from here.
First, I will ask you a few questions.
So let's answer in a quick tempo without thinking too much.
Yes, I'll do my best to keep up the tempo.
Tell me about the recent news events.
I went out with Tsutsuki Rokochan of Ochanoma.
Tomorrow is White Day, the day when Smileage's "Becoming an adult" was released.
Wakana, when do you think it is difficult to be an adult?
Is there anything you are working on for the spring tour?
Yes, I'm working on my physical strength.
What do you think of Mei Yamazaki?
I think she is very decisive and decides on the menu very quickly.
Three years have passed since you joined Angstrom.
What kind of person do you think you've become during this time?
I think I've gained the ability to see what's going on around me.
I just wanted to ask you a cute question.
Mei Yamazaki really likes you, Wakana.
It fits so well. I can feel it.

I usually go to bed early and get up early.
I use the time to weigh my body weight.
I get very sleepy around 11:00 p.m.
And at around 12 o'clock, I turn off the power.
It turns off and goes "ding ding".
Adults tend to work hard at night, don't they?
It's true that some people have to work until nighttime.
That kind of thing is a little too much for some of them.
In that case, there are those who can be active in the morning, and it's better not to break that rhythm.
I think it's good to be an adult like that, and I'm going to do my best.
I'll try to do my best.
Next, I would like to ask Mr. Ishida a question from me.
What are you secretly looking forward to this spring?
I want to go strawberry picking.
Do you have a routine right before a live performance?
Yes, I give high-fives to the members and staff.
Season 11 of Halo Pro Dance Academy will start in about a month, on April 18.
What are the highlights of the new season?
We have invited Tsukushi-san as a teacher this time.
Of course, Tsukushi-san's dance will be the highlight of this season.
We also had a moment when each of us had a free dance.
It was nerve-wracking, but we did our best.
And as we were doing the free dance, Mr. Kaya, the MC, and the two dancers were talking about how they were going to do it.
Kaya-san, the two MCs, also danced, so please pay attention to them.
Which Angelem member would you like to sing with?
She has been a member of Morning Musume。
It's been three and a half months since the group took its current form.
What is the best word to describe the current 13 members?
Oh, that was a little too true at the end.
Okay, the question I wanted to ask is.
Which member of Angelem would you like to sing with?
I personally really like Ayana Kawamura's voice.
There's a kindness in it, but there's also a sincerity.
I admire her attitude towards the live performance, so I always look up to her when I see her perform, so I sang with her and I sang with her.
I mean, I'd rather follow her.
I'd like to bask in the sound of her voice from back then.
Your voice really makes me feel comfortable when I'm on stage with you.
It's so comfortable to be on stage with you.
But you're also both cool and cute.
I think one more thing that's perfect for Morning Musume。 I think it's perfect for Morning Musume。
I think it's definitely new again.
I think the parts she sang are very impressive.
So it's refreshing to see her singing those memorable parts.
So it's refreshing to see her singing those memorable parts even though we're in the same group.
I think it's cool that she's going to express herself in a new way.
I think that's what I want people to see in the future Morning Musume。 I think that's what I want people to see in the future of Morning Musume。
So for the next spring tour...

Morning Musume。 24's Ayumi Ishida and Ajuna Matsumoto of Angulum will be presenting the "Halo! STE.
Morning Musume。24 will start their spring tour this weekend on March 16, and Angelem will start their spring tour on April 6.
Since we are just before their tour, I have selected some live videos of the other group's songs that give you the best sense of togetherness, and I will introduce them in order.
Yes, I chose Morning Musume。 I chose "Namidatch" as my favorite Morning Musume。

We will all be shining stars someday!

It was really great to see it from my point of view.
I think this song is only possible because of the fans.
I was so happy to be able to hear this song at Yokohama Arena.

At the very end of the song, after saying "Come on, Anne", they took a picture of me...
They always do that at every show.
That picture is the real concert.
After the show was over, they showed it on the vision screen and said, "Thank you for today.
